name: King of the Critters
description:
You are the Crown Spirit, an ancient spirit tasked with protecting the critters of the forest. Though recently, you're not so sure they're worth protecting anymore!

Manipulate the scenes unfolding by controlling various critters to protect your true love, a nice snack!



First project with Godot, learned lots!
Created for MizzJam1 using Kenney's 1-bit pack

GitHub Repository

Controls:

  • [Arrows/WASD] - Move
  • [Spacebar] - Interact

Credits:

  • [Programming/Design] - sundowns
  • [Music/Audio]  - Fraysport
